snippet.title: Norm of the North: Arctic Dash
snippet.description:
Available on
App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/arctic-dash-norm-of-the-north/id1073504523
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.animocabrands.google.normarcticdash

It's off to the Arctic races in this multiplayer side-scrolling racing game! Play as the beloved polar bear Norm, or any number of characters from the animated film.  Race against other players and do whatever it takes to cross the finish line first! But be careful...the other players will be out to get you with Bottle Rockets, Frosty Icicles, Sea Mines, and other nasty projectiles!

Play with other people online or host your own game with friends and battle for first place!

Features
- Fast-paced and competitive online multiplayer action
- Navigate through treacherous level design
- Several Norm of the North characters with customizable outfits
- Many skills to learn and items to use to your advantage
- Challenge yourself to be the best and fastest in the world!
